tabs.name: Alpha
tabs.author: MlgmXyysd
tabs.description:
v0.5.1.3
- Android 11 support
- Stability improvements
- Bugs & crashes fix
- Riru v23+ support (no backwards support due to hide macmechanism) #623
- Xposed API 93: New `XSharedPreferences` implemention ([API changes log](https://edxp.meowcat.org/assets/API_changelog.txt)) https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/commit/70f967944cf28cfb3b14d4c67143bb9993194ea9
- Move config files to `/data/misc` (requires latest Manager) https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/commit/baf1d6b6bbb228479af88d1ab9d44d7aeb20ee99
- Move SandHook library to `/data/adb`, Magisk Lite support https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/commit/a1f9bdc7c76fc41f3c45d11f147962f2231c3e45
- Better Xposed Hide for apps in black list #634
- Xposed API 92: Module Activation Scope support https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/commit/2d7b982ff5755e8887d9fb348114fad51d373efc
- Remove unnecessary SEPolicy (might break some ancient modules, report in [Issues](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/issues/new/choose)) https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/commit/35a18e899233a5c50e55be928192b75ccd0dd2a1
- Fix delay hook of SandHook https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/commit/d92b051894f8e05541505a2370b06626c9c4a6b2

**Notes**:
- If you feel the system is running slowly, turn on Xposed Hide(White).
- YAHFA may cause random soft reboot. If there is any problem, please use SandHook variant first.
- If you have problems, please check the [Issues Tracker](https://github.com/ElderDrivers/EdXposed/issues) first. If there is no similar problem, please **use debug version** to catch logs and submit.

tabs.name: Canary
tabs.author: MlgmXyysd
tabs.notice:
WARNING: Canary automatically builds and generates passively by AppVeyor CI, only for developer to test, install it at your own risk. The development team is not responsible for any consequences caused by this channel
警告: Canary 为 AppVeyor CI 自动构建并被动生成，仅供开发者测试, 可能会导致无法开机等问题，开发团队不对此通道所可能造成的任何后果负责

apk.changelog:
v4.5.7.0.0
- Fix crash on first installation
- Enhancement mode
* Remove background restrictions on EdXposed
* Determine if Xposed is working properly
* Pretend to have Xposed Installer installed
